title: Apple is making the iPhone purchase experience quicker for AT&T and T-Mobile customers
content:
For the longest time, when users would try to buy an iPhone in the US, they’d have to provide their mobile numbers and last four digits of their Social Security Numbers (SSN). The carrier would then run a credit check before Apple approves the purchase. This made the buying process a bit longer for both

The post Apple is making the iPhone purchase experience quicker for AT&T and T-Mobile customers appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple is making the iPhone purchasing experience quicker for AT&T and T-Mobile customers by asking them fewer questions online and in stores.
